Ice fealt for Alpha, she had lost many friends in this war. If the mutant h=
ad her way she'd be stranded on a deserted planetoid somewhere with Lunarpi=
ne. "I'm sorry about your friend." her spark reached out for the strength t=
o control her emotions and her thoughts. "But for now we need to concentrat=
e on the task before us." she quickly scanned the minds of the Maximals aro=
und to see if any were hurt, "Circle around and try to hit it from behind."=
 she wanted to direct Surgital away from the city to do that they had to wo=
rk together.

arpine
